title: Rada - Red Leopard Mall
description: Second location in Ekaterinburg. A cafe with a buffet of about 10 warm dishes plus some salads and two soups. Only has a few vegan options (a single main dish and vegetable soup). Some staff speak English well and can help point out vegan items and ones that can be made vegan. Russian street address: ул. Вайнера, 8, Галерея "Красный леопард", 2 этаж. Walk in through a red entrance to the Red Leopard mall and the restaurant is directly up the stairs to your left.
